title: A Request for Review Unit of upcoming Pixel 4XL.
content:
Hey Google/MadeByGoogle!

I want to ask that could you please send me your products? So that I can share my reviews about those products with you. I'm also planning to create a YouTube Channel. I'll review them on my YouTube Channel too.

I'll be very thankful to you!

Anxiously waiting for your reply.

Regards,
Shayan Nadeem
